mapper.select: SELECT IT_CD as itCd , IMG_CD as imgCd , IT_NM as itNm , PRICE as price , CAT as cat , TY_CD as tyCd FROM TB_ITEM WHERE IT_CD = #{itCd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MP_MEMBER_ITEM WHERE MB_ID=#{mbId} AND IT_CD=#{itCd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM "IDX" ,ORD . * FROM ( IT_CD as itCd , IMG_CD as imgCd , IT_NM as itNm , PRICE as price , CAT as cat , OPT_ADD as optAdd FROM FROM TB_ITEM WHERE CAT = #{cat} ORDER BY IT_CD DESC ) "ORD" ) WHERE IDX BETWEEN #{startIdx} AND #{endIdx};
